alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Forest, Marinette, northern Oconto and east central Langlade Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Goodman to near McCaslin Mountain Natural Area to near Carter. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Goodman around 430 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wausaukee, Bear Paw Scout Camp, Crivitz and Pound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
